Character indicating the start of an escape character for encoding characters of values 128 - 255 in ASCII language files.

G

getEscapedCharacter(BufferedInputStream) - Static method in class uk.ac.umist.co.brailletrans.utils.Maker
If a '\x' character is encountered in a language human file it might be an escape sequence for a 256-character set value.

M

MakeAll - class uk.ac.umist.co.brailletrans.utils.MakeAll.
Creates machine-format language files from data files for all types, by calling in turn the MakeLanguageUnicode and MakeLegacy classes.
MakeLanguageUnicode - class uk.ac.umist.co.brailletrans.utils.MakeLanguageUnicode.
Creates Unicode version Language files as LanguageUnicode objects from the simple text editable version.
MakeLegacy - class uk.ac.umist.co.brailletrans.utils.MakeLegacy.
Constructs a legacy language rules table file in machine format from a text format file.
Maker - class uk.ac.umist.co.brailletrans.utils.Maker.
Provides functions and constants for the Make programs that produce formatted machine-readable language files from their corresponding human-editable data files.
main(String[]) - Static method in class uk.ac.umist.co.brailletrans.utils.MakeAll
Provides command-line functionality for language process

Command-line interface to translation function.
main(String[]) - Static method in class uk.ac.umist.co.brailletrans.utils.MakeLegacy
Command-line access to conversion process.
make(String, String) - Static method in class uk.ac.umist.co.brailletrans.utils.MakeLanguageUnicode
Turns the text-format human-editable inputFilename file into the LanguageUnicode serialized object outputFilename .
make(String, String) - Static method in class uk.ac.umist.co.brailletrans.utils.MakeLegacy
Performs actual conversion of CON files to DAT files.
